Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.selection

Class StockSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.selection.StockSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StockSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Determines the best n stocks out of a collection. The functionality can be restarted if a Restartable has been defined and is picking up the last processed state
    Author:
    pschatzmann
